summary: Build an extra-long, modern, visually engaging portfolio website for SolviroStudio focused on Meta Ads and Creative Design for solar companies, with specified navigation, branded gradient color scheme, multiple proof/results sections, portfolio showcases, testimonials, and a contact form to drive leads and trust.
architectural_notes: Site should be modern/clean/professional, results-focused for solar companies, with prominent CTAs on every major section.
Use brand accent/CTA gradients and highlights with #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 including hero background gradient (#FFD233→#FFA500→#FF6A00).
Portfolio section should support 5–7 project entries each with an image, campaign goal, and measurable results (leads/engagement/ROI).
Client Results section should support multiple screenshots/graphics/charts placeholders for proof and metrics.
Contact section includes email (solvirostudio@gmail.com), phone placeholder, and simple contact form.

existing_features.title: Build a single-page, extra-long scrolling portfolio website for “SolviroStudio” with a top navigation menu linking to in-page sections: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us.

Implement the site-wide visual system using the brand colors #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 for buttons, accents, and highlights, including a consistent gradient treatment (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) and a modern, clean, professional layout suitable for a results-focused solar marketing agency.
Create the Home (Hero) section with the exact headline, subheadline, CTA button text, and a professional gradient background using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.
Create the About SolviroStudio section with the provided text, include an optional visual (image/illustration), and include a CTA button labeled “Learn More”.

Create the Services section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions each: (1) Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies, (2) Creative Design & Visual Campaigns, (3) ROI-Focused Lead Generation; include a CTA button labeled “Explore Services”.

Create the Portfolio section showcasing 5–7 projects with visuals; each project block must include an Ad Design Image, a Campaign Goal (e.g., generate solar leads), and Results achieved (leads, engagement, ROI metrics); include a CTA button labeled “View Full Portfolio”.
Create a Client Results section designed to hold multiple screenshots/graphics of real campaign results, including the provided intro text and a CTA button labeled “Get Your Results”.
Create the Testimonials section with 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses, including the provided supporting text.

Create the Contact Us section with the provided text, display the email “solvirostudio@gmail.com”, display a phone placeholder, and provide a simple contact form with a CTA button labeled “Contact Me”.

Ensure every major section (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact) contains a prominent call-to-action button as specified, and those CTAs provide sensible navigation (e.g., scroll to Contact/Services/Portfolio) consistent with a lead-generation flow.

Add static asset support for the requested visuals (team illustration, portfolio ad designs, client results graphics/charts) and render them in the appropriate sections from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create SolviroStudio extra-long scrolling portfolio website (Home, Portfolio, About, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact) with branded gradient (#FFD233→#FFA500→#FF6A00), CTAs in each section, portfolio project blocks, results/proof visuals areas, testimonials, and contact form.

Implement backend support to store contact form submissions in the Motoko canister (single-actor), including a query method to list submissions for administrative review (no public UI required unless minimal view is necessary).
